Description:
A Great Place To Start Or Invest
Set in a lovely quiet court just off Napier Street sits this affordable property which offers great potential. Featuring a large lounge with gas heater and A/c, separate kitchen/Dining area, 3 bedrooms and the added bonus of an extra room which could be used as a 4th bedroom. Leave as is and secure a tenant at an expected $260 per week, or bring your thinking cap and imagine the possibilities..

Description:
Potential Plus..!!
Overlooking the proposed Botanical Garden Development and a short walk to White Hills Shops and White Hills Primary School is this rare gem that is sure to appeal to savvy investor, owner occupier and developers alike. While the home itself is in need of work, the opportunity and potential cannot be denied. The land measures approximately 836m2 and features a 3 bedroom home, oversized pergola plus a 6mx9m shed and skillion. The home would respond well to renovation while the development potential of the block should be explored given its perfect location. A quiet part of town yet only minutes to the Bendigo CBD, Lake Weeroona and with the prospect of adjoining the Botanical Gardens this property is a must see!
Insights: 16 Bosquet Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2015 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
CONSIDERING BUILDING?... CONSIDER THIS
Beautifully appointed throughout, this 3 year young home offers spacious open living with bi fold doors opening onto a huge enclosed polished concrete patio set on a spacious established 780sqm allotment.
- 3 Bedrooms, ensuite and walk in robe to the main
- Expansive open plan kitchen / meals and living zone
- High ceilings, ducted heating and cooling
- Timber floating floors, 7.5 star energy rating
Within walking distance to the Botanic gardens, Primary and Pre-Schools, White Hills shops, sporting facilities and public transport. Presented to perfection.

Description:
Subdivision Opportunity
The perfect investment for the budding developer or investor, this 2 bedroom home is primed for development. The BV home with rendered front comprises of 2 bedrooms, bathroom with extra large shower, evaporative cooling & GWF and kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Outside the opportunities come alive with ample access and services in all the right spots to accommodate an additional 2 townhouses STCA.
With land close to Bendigo becoming harder and harder to obtain, this is not one to let slip past.

Description:
Freshly Renovated And Ready For You
This 3 bedroom cream BV has been fully restored and offers exceptional value for both owner-occupiers and investors. From the brand new bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles and designer bath to the fully equipped contemporary kitchen, the property exuberates class and style. Situated in a quiet leafy street, the property is a mere 5 min drive into the CBD and the new Bendigo Hospital. With land measuring some 843m2 and suitable access to one side of the property, it is also suited for subdivision STCA.
Move in now and reap the rewards later.

Description:
CALIFORNIA BUNGALOW - INVEST OR RENOVATE
This California Bungalow has all the classic traits of the era and is set on a large block with easy access to the CBD. Inside the home the rooms are spacious, the formal lounge has a gas wall heater and reverse cycle split system, the large kitchen has room for a dining setting and all three bedrooms have ceiling fans. The built in porch at the rear is an ideal home office or separate living area. Outside you will find a covered entertaining area with a fernery to one side and thebig backyard is also home to a large steel garage/workshop and a quirky kids' cubby house.Close to public transport, schools and shops this is a great location to invest in the future.

Description:
Updated Home with Classic Features
This home has such a welcoming feel and incorporates both modern and classic styling, making anyone feel right at home! Set behind a new fence on a private 776sqm allotment and with scope for a large shed if required.
Decorative cornices, picture rails and high ceilings are just some of the original features still present throughout this beautiful home. The main bedroom comes complete with an ensuite and walk in robe while the second and third bedrooms have built in robes. The large fully equipped kitchen is set on beautiful polished hardwood floors and has all the modern conveniences expected as well as gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling. The dining and lounge room adjoin the kitchen and provide a great space to rest and relax.
Two outdoor entertaining areas allow for great parties or an ideal spot to sit and watch children play. A grey water treatment plant allows you to reuse water for the surrounding gardens, minimising waste and keeping the garden watered at no extra cost..!

Description:
Easy Living In The Perfect Position
Perfectly suited to a retiree, first homebuyer or investor, this brilliant two-bedroom townhouse combines low maintenance proportions with a convenient location close to White Hills Shopping, Primary & Secondary Schools, Bendigo Botanic Gardens, Bowling Club, an so much more all within walking distance, or with public transport easily available. Offered in exceptional condition with a neat kitchen, a spacious lounge area, two well proportioned bedrooms with built in robes high ceilings, large main bathroom, good heating and cooling, single carport, small shed with room to expand if needed, or you may alter it to fit the boat or caravan. If you are busy professional or looking to travel for part of the year then look no further then this low maintenance home, live comfortably, and enjoy all your spare time. Currently leased to an ideal tenant at $260 per week.

Description:
Perfect Starter with Sub-Division Potential
Located in White Hills just 50 metres to the White Hills primary school, you will find this original weatherboard home.
In a well-kept condition, the home comprises of 2 bedrooms, a large central lounge with gas heating in a feature brick surround, and functional kitchen with adjacent dining room.
With both heating and cooling, the climate will be easily controlled throughout the year.
But, outside on the generous 850m2(approx.) corner lot is what this property is all about.
You could enjoy the space as it is, which allows for plenty of room for children and pets to play, or the option is there to sub-divide (STCA).
There is also a 6m x 6m shed with concrete floor and an undercover alfresco area.
Close to shops and public transport, with the added bonus of being just a short walk to the Botanical Gardens and pool.
Call to inspect today.
Matt Landy : 0459 098 848

Description:
HEART WARMING FORTIES VINTAGE
Lovers of all things retro will appreciate this classic home built in the mid forties. Fashionable and prestigious for its time, it would have been worthy of a place on the pages of the Australian Home Beautiful magazine back then. The solid-brick construction retains many distinguishing features of its era including wide entry hall with high, ornate ceilings, double-hung sash windows, polished hardwood ­floors, quaint timber servery doors and cabinetry between kitchen and dining room and a feature tapestry-brick replace surround with timber mantel and ­flanked by display cabinets finished with etched glass doors on either side in the lounge room. Three large and light bedrooms all have built-in robes while the bathroom has recently had a stunning vintage-themed makeover. It's all glossy black-and white tiles with a frameless shower screen, wc and retro pedestal hand basin. The remodeled timber kitchen is equipped with gas hotplates, electric wall oven, breakfast bar and ample cabinetry. Modern comforts include gas log-fire in the lounge, ducted heating and two split system units. Outside a very private covered, paved full length entertainment area overlooks a lush fernery and
lawn area for the kids to play in the secure back yard. Sited on corner allotment of about 693 square metres with twin garages with auto doors accessed from both streets. Located opposite the Bendigo Botanical Gardens and walking distance to preschool centre, schools and public transport. A classic and heart warming home for retro types.
Helen Ashby : 0408 42 5566

Description:
LOCATION AND OPPORTUNITY
Sitting on a 434m2m (approx) corner allotment is this late 1970's established three bedroom brick veneer home in the tightly held area of White Hills. Spacious formal lounge with large aluminium windows, gas space heater and reverse cycle split system. Two of the three large bedrooms offer built in robes. Kitchen includes electric stove, great bench space and adjacent roomy meals area.
Central bathroom provides vanity and an updated shower.
Alongside the home at the front entrance is a secure fenced carport. Additional access from Dundas Street, which leads across the rear of the property to a single, tilt door garage (concrete and power).
An immediately comfortable family home in a most affordable price range!! Positioned only one block to White Hills local shopping precinct and bus route into Bendigo's CBD. Great local schools and churches close by.
No car required. Simply place your own stamp on this solid family home.
Make this one your home or investment! A Super Opportunity
Directions: Corner Plumridge Street and Dundas Street, White Hills
Di Long : 0417 343 380

Address: 8 Seventh Hill Court White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
LOOK AT ME !
This superbly presented Russell Parsons built home in a quiet court, is going to appeal to a wide variety of people. It's close to the Bendigo Racecourse, schools, shops, Botanic Gardens, churches, pubs & public transport. There's plenty of room for extra vehicles such as a van or boat, and the workshop of approximately 10mx8m, with mezzanine and reverse cycle heating and cooling, is something a tradie would die for! The huge Al Fresco area is great for year round outdoor entertaining. Internally, the bathroom has been updated to include a double shower, the major kitchen appliances are new and the gas heater and ducted evaporative cooling ensure year round comfort. Whether you're a, tradesperson, retiree, investor or just looking for a pristine home in a quiet spot, an inspection is a must. Expected rental of $340 to $350 per week.

Description:
SEVERAL OPTIONS
Perfectly positioned three bedroom weather board home on a corner allotment (Cahill St) of 1011m2 (approx.). Large master bedroom with built in robes and a ceiling fan. Well lit large living area with open fire place and reverse cycle split system opens into the renovated kitchen/meals area all showcasing lovely contemporary timber floor boards. Kitchen comprises upright gas stove, dishwasher and plenty of space for a table and chairs. Central tiled bathroom: bath and separate shower.
Under cover full length rear concreted veranda - ideal for entertaining. Alongside the single garage is a small workshop. Currently leased at $280pw until 4th August 2015. Close to transport into Bendigo, Lake Weeroona and great local schools.
Options include: Council approved Planning Permit for a 2 Lot subdivision, ample scope for further renovation or an extension.

Description:
Victorian Gem in Popular White Hills
This lovely Victorian home has been held within the same family for the past 45 years, and has finally come up for sale.
Evident as you walk through the front gate, character and charm is in abundance.
The bull-nose front verandah with ornate lace-work leads you through the front door to the central hallway, which runs the length of the home.
In keeping with the era of the home decorative ceilings, walls and polished floorboards are a feature.
The 3 large bedrooms all have ceiling fans, the main bedroom also has a built in robe, and ceiling fans can also be found in the lounge and kitchen.
The formal lounge is massive with a central fire place and split system air-conditioning, while the modern kitchen includes gas cooking.
The back verandah looks onto a lush, eclectic garden that blends gracefully into the tapestry of foliage that so characterises this leafy area.
With water tanks, a vegetable patch and established fruit trees, the yard concludes in a double carport and 7m x 6m shed, both readily accessible via the convenient driveway that runs the length of this 1073m2 block.
This home will suit a family or anyone looking for a suburban sanctuary with space to live and breathe.
Plenty of room for a pool (STCA) or possible subdivision potential (STCA).
Just a 2 minute walk from the nearest school, with shops, public transport, kinder, and the extended Botanical Gardens all less than 5 minutes on foot.
An inspection will impress.
Adrian Robinson : 0408 389 680

Address: 108 St Killian Street WHITE HILLS VIC 3550
Description:
Spacious and Conveniently Located
Situated on a spacious 923m2 block in a quiet street, and only 7 minutes from the CBD, finds this fully-renovated home ideal for 1st home buyers or investors.
The home has been repainted and recarpeted, with new appliances, so it's ready to move in to straight away.
Comprising of 3 bedrooms all featuring new built-in robes, good sized lounge, split system air-conditioner plus separate dining room.
The bright new modern kitchen offers stainless steel appliances including range hood, electric oven, gas stove, dishwasher and double sink.
New 3 piece bathroom, separate toilet and revamped laundry. Outside offers a large covered alfresco, ideal for entertaining in all seasons, double tilt-door garage/workshop plus garden shed.
With the Botanical Gardens, schools, sporting facilities and local shops within walking distance, convenience is assured.
Do not miss this fantastic opportunity to enter the market or expand your investment portfolio at such an affordable price.
Damien O'Shannessy : 0417 055 593

Description:
'MYRNIONG'
What an amazing lifestyle property!In the same hands for approximately 7 decades, situated less than 10 minutes from the heart of the city and offering 75 acres of privacy, peace and quiet with great access to the Wellsford forest, an abundance of native trees plus a large dam with a seasonal creek and excellent catchment.
This unique property has a substantial brick home that was built a little over 65 years ago and offers 4 bedrooms plus an L shaped lounge and dining room. Last farmed in 1983 the property is now regenerating naturally and with a little help from the current owners.
The final word - our vendor has previously written - " The peace of mind from living in the bush provides a lifestyle that the majority of mankind miss"
TERMS: 10% Deposit / Balance 60 Days

Description:
Sensational Starter!
A delightful renovation has seen this classic period residence restored to its former glory. The home has undergone a complete restoration with a new and modern interior that is both fresh and functional. The light filled home features a fully appointed kitchen with 900ml gas stove and matching stainless steel appliances. There are 2 spacious bedrooms plus home office and a large lounge room which is the gathering point of this fantastic property. Central heating and cooling ensures climate control and there are 2 toilets. There is side access to the spacious rear yard which includes multiple shedding and a workshop. Close to schools, public transport and picturesque Lake Weeroona. With all the work done simply move in and enjoy!

Description:
Appealing Home with Super Shedding
Luke Goggin Real Estate â?? "We Get Results" 54 42 1422
BEAUTIFULLY presented, it this 3 bedroom, plus study home, featuring a double garage with internal access, a 9x7.5m shed & another 9x4.6m shed (with toilet), all on a 954m2 allotment (approx). Heating & cooling are ducted throughout the home & high ceilings create a spacious feel. A long formal lounge room with a bay window is at the front & across the tiled hallway is the study. An open-plan design comprises the kitchen, dining & living areas.The well-equipped kitchen has an electric oven, gas cooktop , a dishwasher plus a built-in pantry. From the living room end a door opens to an undercover alfresco area. 3 bedrooms, a 3 piece family bathroom & a laundry are off a hallway at the rear of the home. Two bedrooms have built-in robes, while a large main bedroom features a walk-in robe & an ensuite. Outside you will find a rainwater tank, neat concrete paths & a fernery. Double gates & a long driveway provide perfect access to the backyard.
Luke Goggin Real Estate - "We Get Results"

Description:
SOLID RESIDENCE WITH SPACIOUS LIVING
Located within a short drive to all the facilities and services of central Bendigo, is this neatly presented cream brick residence on a low maintenance allotment.
The floorplan comprises three spacious bedrooms, kitchen/meals area, separate formal lounge plus a large rumpus/living area which adds further appeal and uniqueness to a home of this era.
The enclosed private yard offers a comfortable outdoor sitting area and off street undercover car parking is available.
The property's appeal is further enhanced by its close proximity to Lake Weeroona, local high school and recreational facilities.
Perfect for first home buyers, investors or retirees.
Bawa Singh : 0402 206 745
